HomePage.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage tenders efficiently
HomePage.docManagementDescription: Upload and organize tender documents with ease. Support for PDF and common file formats.
HomePage.collaborationDescription: Invite collaborators to your workspaces and work together seamlessly on tenders.
HomePage.analysisDescription: Get automated analysis of your tender documents with actionable insights.
HomePage.automationDescription: Let AI extract key information and generate summaries from your documents.
